title: Hizb ut-Tahrir
summary: Hizb ut-Tahrir (Arabic: حزب التحرير‎, romanized: Ḥizb at-Taḥrīr, lit. 'Party of Liberation'; HT) is an international pan-Islamist and fundamentalist political organization whose stated aim is the re-establishment of the Islamic caliphate to unite the Muslim community (called ummah)[3] and implement sharia globally.[lower-alpha 1][lower-alpha 2]
